entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with drizzle early this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
